callback_with_context.context_function_id: (spawn_force_tooltip = TooltipForSpawnForceExcludeResources("wh3_main_ogr_basic_camp", true), general_to_respawn = StoredContext("CcoCampaignCharacter")) => {GetIfElse(spawn_force_tooltip.IsEmpty && (IsContextValid(general_to_respawn) && OgreCampRecruitment.CanRespawn(parent_force, general_to_respawn)) == false, Loc("wh3_dlc26_ogr_tooltip_redeploy_camp_none_available"), spawn_force_tooltip)}

dy_turns.componentleveltooltip: Turns until this Camp can be redeployed.

callback_with_context.context_function_id: #block propagation of parent force from character_panel_info_holder so that we can display details about this character's force

toggle_switch.componentleveltooltip: Switch display between forces and buildings for Reserve Camps
